card.text: Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Retrace

card.name: Take Possession
card.text: Split second Enchant permanent You control enchanted permanent.

card.name: Tar Pitcher
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Tar Pitcher deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Tarmogoyf
card.text: Tarmogoyf's power is equal to the number of card types among cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

card.name: Terashi's Grasp
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.

card.name: Terramorphic Expanse
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Test of Faith
card.text: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn, and put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way.

card.name: Thallid
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Thallid. Remove three spore counters from Thallid: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Thallid Germinator
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Thallid Germinator. Remove three spore counters from Thallid Germinator: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield. Sacrifice a Saproling: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Thallid Shell-Dweller
card.text: Defender At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Thallid Shell-Dweller. Remove three spore counters from Thallid Shell-Dweller: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Thieving Sprite
card.text: Flying When Thieving Sprite enters the battlefield, target player reveals X cards from his or her hand, where X is the number of Faeries you control. You choose one of those cards. That player discards that card.

card.name: Thirst for Knowledge
card.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.

card.name: Thundercloud Shaman
card.text: When Thundercloud Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to the number of Giants you control to each non-Giant creature.

card.name: Tidehollow Sculler
card.text: When Tidehollow Sculler enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card. When Tidehollow Sculler leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Tooth and Nail
card.text: Choose one - Search your library for up to two creature cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library; or put up to two creature cards from your hand onto the battlefield. Entwine {2}

card.name: Torrent of Stone
card.text: Torrent of Stone deals 4 damage to target creature. Splice onto Arcane - Sacrifice two Mountains.

card.name: Traumatic Visions
card.text: Counter target spell. Basic landcycling {1}{U}

card.name: Tribal Flames
card.text: Domain - Tribal Flames deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

card.name: Tromp the Domains
card.text: Domain - Until end of turn, creatures you control gain trample and get +1/+1 for each basic land type among lands you control.

card.name: Trygon Predator
card.text: Flying Whenever Trygon Predator deals combat damage to a player, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment that player controls.

card.name: Vedalken Dismisser
card.text: When Vedalken Dismisser enters the battlefield, put target creature on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Vedalken Shackles
card.text: You may choose not to untap Vedalken Shackles during your untap step. {2}, {T}: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of Islands you control for as long as Vedalken Shackles remains tapped.

card.name: Vendilion Clique
card.text: Flash Flying When Vendilion Clique enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of his or her library, then draws a card.

card.name: Verdeloth the Ancient
Veteran Armorer
card.text: Other creatures you control get +0/+1.

card.name: Vivid Crag
card.text: Vivid Crag enters the battlefield tapped with two charge counters on it. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Crag: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Vivid Creek
card.text: Vivid Creek enters the battlefield tapped with two charge counters on it. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Creek: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Vivid Grove
card.text: Vivid Grove enters the battlefield tapped with two charge counters on it. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Grove: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Vivid Marsh
card.text: Vivid Marsh enters the battlefield tapped with two charge counters on it. {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Marsh: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Vivid Meadow
card.text: Vivid Meadow enters the battlefield tapped with two charge counters on it. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Meadow: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Walker of the Grove
card.text: When Walker of the Grove leaves the battlefield, put a 4/4 green Elemental creature token onto the battlefield. Evoke {4}{G}

card.name: Warren Pilferers
card.text: When Warren Pilferers enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If that card is a Goblin card, Warren Pilferers gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Warren Weirding
card.text: Target player sacrifices a creature. If a Goblin is sacrificed this way, that player puts two 1/1 black Goblin Rogue creature tokens onto the battlefield, and those tokens gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: War-Spike Changeling
card.text: Changeling {R}: War-Spike Changeling gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Woodfall Primus
card.text: Trample When Woodfall Primus enters the battlefield, destroy target noncreature permanent. Persist

card.name: Worm Harvest
card.text: Put a 1/1 black and green Worm creature token onto the battlefield for each land card in your graveyard. Retrace

card.name: Yosei, the Morning Star
card.text: Flying When Yosei, the Morning Star dies, target player skips his or her next untap step. Tap up to five target permanents that player controls.
